# Github Repos {#sec-basics}

## NLP Repositories

1. [Tutorials on implementing a few sequence-to-sequence (seq2seq) models with PyTorch and TorchText](https://github.com/bentrevett/pytorch-seq2seq)

> This repo contains tutorials covering understanding and implementing sequence-to-sequence (seq2seq) models using PyTorch 1.8, torchtext 0.9 and spaCy 3.0, using Python 3.8.




2. [Tutorials on implementing a few sequence-to-sequence (seq2seq) models with PyTorch and TorchText](https://github.com/bentrevett/pytorch-sentiment-analysis)

> This repo contains tutorials covering how to do sentiment analysis using PyTorch 1.8 and torchtext 0.9 using Python 3.7.

3. [A Tour of PyTorch Optimizers](https://github.com/bentrevett/a-tour-of-pytorch-optimizers)

> In this repo implement different gradient descent optimization algorithms by describing how they work and then implementing them in PyTorch (using version 1.10).
